I have the same problem on Linux with the 3M8 version. 
 
The problem seems to be that the package of the Templates class in 
eclipse/plugins/org.eclipse.jdt.ui_3.0.0/jdt.jar has changed from 
 
org/eclipse/jdt/internal/corext/template/Templates.class (as expected by 
AspectJPlugin) 
to 
org/eclipse/jdt/internal/corext/template/java/Templates.class

AJDT 1.1.4 supports Eclipse only until version 3M4.
For working with Eclipse 3M8, try using AJDT 1.1.7 (available soon) or the 
current Developer Build.
Eclipse versions between 3M4 and 3M8 are not supported.

Sorry, mistake in previous posting: the current Developer Build (1.1.6) does 
not work with 3M8.

AJDT 1.1.7 is now available, can you download it from our website and try it 
on the Mac?  I believe it fixes your problem.

thanks.
Problem is solved, so far as I can tell.
I am running with 1.1.9 on Windows EclipseM8 and i get the exact same problem

Apologies, meant to copy in the log file.  I am presently downloading M9 and
will report back if this error still persists.
